field.name: DESCRIPTION
field.value: #ID# - The result ID #ATTEMPT_ID# - The attempt ID #TEST_NAME# - The test name #USER# - The user taking a test #DATE# - The date and time #QUESTION_TEXT# - The question #ANSWER_TEXT# - The answer #EMAIL_FROM# - The sender's e-mail address #EMAIL_TO# - The recipient's e-mail address #MESSAGE_TITLE# - The e-mail message subject
